Hi Tony,

We have just received an update from our colleagues.

They have prepared a client build for this.

Please test this build on a few computers(it is the 5941 release build) and see if the issue persists. If you would like we can schedule a remote session in order to test this together next week. Please also try to turn on Stealth DPI from Device Control -> Computer -> Manage Settings -> Deep Packet Inspection before testing.

Please let us know the outcome.

Download link:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp09122024/EppClient_v6.2.4.1006.zip

Best Regards,
